entity_type: can we standardize types? INDIVIDUAL | CORPORATION | LLC | UNINCORPORATED_ASSOCIATION
formation_doc_hash: a hash of whatever legal text links this entity to a state-registered entity
formation_doc_url: ideally IPFS link to full formation text
jurisdiction_national: ISO 3166 two-letter, three-letter or numeric country code
jurisdiction_regional: state or province in format of national locale
registration_number: file number in state trade register
registration_url: link to official filing, if avaiable
last_update: date of last update (ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD)
